### class: [Plugin](https://github.com/berstend/puppeteer-extra/blob/7a9082f9837f2403099e2181d639aa0065c51ba9/packages/puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth/evasions/sourceurl/index.js#L9-L58)

- `opts` (optional, default `{}`)

**Extends: PuppeteerExtraPlugin**

Strip sourceURL from scripts injected by puppeteer.
It can be used to identify the presence of pptr via stacktraces.
